parsed_action.reasoning: With no recent events or sales data, apply a small controlled price test to probe demand while protecting margin. Increase Electronics to 21.99 (+10%) to test willingness to pay on typically higher-margin category, slightly discount Home Goods to 19.49 to stimulate volume, and discount Apparel more to 18.99 to encourage sell-through of the largest inventory.
